TER
Class TERDefaultValues

java.lang.Object
  TER.TERDefaultValues

public class TERDefaultValues
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used by many others to obtain default values of TER coder. It's useful to put all default values here because many of them are used in more than one site.

Version:
1.2
Author:
Group on Interactive Coding of Images (GICI)

Constructor Detail

TERDefaultValues

Method Detail

integerToBooleanComponents

public static boolean[] integerToBooleanComponents(int[] intComponents,
                                                   int size,
                                                   boolean defaultValue)
This function converts an array of integer that represents components (p.e. if array is 0,2 indicates component 0 and 2) to an array of booleans that indicates if a component is marked or not (p.e. 0,2,4 is true,false,true,false,true) .

Parameters:
intComponents - an array of integers representing selected components
size - array size of components
defaultValue - indicates the default value
Returns:
an array of booleans representing the components passed
